maqras.text: 69|1|jisaka hona sach hai.
69|2|vah kya hai, jisaka hona sach hai
69|3|tatha aap kya jaanen ki kya hai, jisaka hona sach hai
69|4|jhuthalaaya samood tatha aad (jaati) ne achaanak aa padane vaalee (pralay) ko.
69|5|phir samood, to ve dhvast kar diye gaye ati kadee dhvani se.
69|6|tatha aad, to ve dhvast kar diye gaye ek tez sheetal aandhee se.
69|7|lagaaye rakha use unapar saat raaten aur aath din nirantar, to aap dekhate ki ve jaati usamen aise pachhaadee huee hai, jaise khajoor ke khokhale tane.
69|8|to kya aap dekhate hain ki unamen koee shesh rah gaya hai
69|9|aur kiya yahee paap firaun ne aur jo usake poorv the tatha jinakee bastiyaan aundhee kar dee gayeen.
69|10|unhonne nahin maana apane paalanahaar ke rasool ko. antatah, usane pakad liya unhen, kadee pakad.
69|11|hamane, jab seema paar kar gaya jal, to tumhen savaar kar diya naav[1] mein.
69|12|taaki ham bana den use tumhaare lie ek shikshaaprad yaadagaar aur taaki surakshit rakh len ise sunane vaale kaan.
69|13|phir jab phoonk dee jaayegee soor (narasingha) mein ek phoonk.
69|14|aur uthaaya jaayega dharatee tatha parvaton ko, to donon choor-choor kar diye jaayenge[1] ek hee baar mein.
69|15|to usee din honee ho jaayegee.
69|16|tatha phat jaayega aakaash, to vah us din ksheen nirbal ho jaayega.
69|17|aur farishte usake kinaaron par honge tatha uthaaye honge aapake paalanahaar ke arsh (sinhaasan) ko apane oopar us din, aath farishte.
69|18|us din tum allaah ke paas upasthit kiye jaoge, nahin chhupa rah jaayega tumamen se koee.
69|19|phir jise diya jaayega usaka karmapatr daayen haath mein, vah kahegaah ye lo mera karmapatr padho.
69|20|mujhe vishvaas tha ki main milane vaala hoon apane haisaab se.
69|21|to vah apane man chaahe sukh mein hoga.
69|22|uchch shrenee ke svarg mein.
69|23|jisake phalon ke guchchhe jhuk rahe honge.
69|24|(unase kaha jaayegaah) khao tatha piyo aanand lekar usake badale, jo tumane kiya hai vigat dinon (sansaar) mein.
69|25|aur jise diya jaayega usaka karmapatr usake baayen haath mein, to vah kahegaah haay! mujhe mera karmapatr diya hee na jaata
69|26|tatha main na jaanata ki kya hai mera haisaab
69|27|kaash meree maut hee nirnaayak[1] hotee
69|28|nahin kaam aaya mera dhan.
69|29|mujhase samaapt ho gaya, mera prabhutv.
69|30|(aadesh hoga ki) use pakado aur usake gale mein tauq daal do.
69|31|phir narak mein use jhonk do.
69|32|phir use ek janjeer jisakee lambaee sattar gaz hai, mein jakad do.
69|33|vah eemaan nahin rakhata tha mahimaashaalee allaah par.
69|34|aur na prerana deta tha daridr ko bhojan karaane kee.
69|35|atah, nahin hai usaka aaj yahaan koee mitr.
69|36|aur na koee bhojan, peep ke siva.
69|37|jise paapee hee khaayenge.
69|38|to main shapath leta hoon usakee, jo tum dekhate ho.
69|39|tatha jo tum nahin dekhate ho.
69|40|nihsandeh, ye (quraan) aadaraneey rasool ka kathan[1] hai.
69|41|aur vah kisee kavi ka kathan nahin hai. tum log kam hee vishvaas karate ho.
69|42|aur na vah kisee jyotishee ka kathan hai, tum kam kee shiksha grahan karate ho.
69|43|sarvalok ke paalanahaar ka utaara hua hai.
69|44|aur yadi isane (nabee ne) hamapar koee baat banaee[1] hotee.
69|45|to avashy ham pakad lete usaka seedha haath.
69|46|phir avashy kaat dete usake gale kee rag.
69|47|phir tumamen se koee (mujhe) usase rokane vaala na hota.
69|48|nihsandeh, ye ek shiksha hai sadaachaariyon ke lie.
69|49|tatha vaastav mein ham jaanate hain ki tumamen kuchh jhuthalaane vaale hain.
69|50|aur nishchay ye pachhataave ka kaaran hoga kaafiron[1] ke lie.
69|51|vastutah, ye vishvasaneey saty hai.
69|52|atah, aap pavitrata ka varnan karen apane mahimaavaan paalanahaar ke naam kee.
70|1|prashn kiya ek prashn karane[1] vaale ne us yaatana ke baare mein, jo aane vaalee hai.
70|2|kaafiron par. nahin hai jise koee door karane vaala.
70|3|allaah oonchaeeyon vaale kee or se.
70|4|chadhate hain farishte tatha rooh[1] jisakee or, ek din mein, jisaka maap pachaas hazaar varsh hai.
70|5|atah, (he nabee!) aap sahan[1] karen achchhe prakaar se.
70|6|ve samajhate hain use door.
70|7|aur ham dekh rahe hain use sameep.
70|8|jis din ho jaayega aakaash pighalee huee dhaatu ke samaan.
70|9|tatha ho jaayenge parvat, rangaarang dhune hue oon ke samaan.
70|10|aur nahin poochhega koee mitr kisee mitr ko.
70|11|(jabaki) ve unhen dikhaaye jaayenge. kaamana karega paapee ki dand ke roop mein de de, us din kee yaatana ke, apane putron ko.
70|12|tatha apanee patnee aur apane bhaee ko.
70|13|tatha apane sameepavartee parivaar ko, jo use sharan deta tha.
70|14|aur jo dharatee mein hai, sabhee[1] ko, phir vah use yaatana se bacha le.
70|15|kadaapi (aisa) nahin (hoga).
70|16|vah agni kee jvaala hogee.
70|17|khaal udhedane vaalee.
70|18|vah pukaaregee use, jisane peechha dikhaaya[1] tatha munh phera.
